speaker: Bill Heerman
title: Living Together In Christian Unity
blurb: Paul’s goal in writing to his friends is to deepen their faith. As he defends himself and his ministry against specific accusations, he puts forward an example of relating to Corinthian church, where we find an encouragement to live a self-denying, unified life with brothers and sisters in Christ. The power to live like that comes from our identity in Christ—all of us sinners who need a savior. Our purpose to bring all glory of God.
